about_the_game:
Planet of the Ants is a fast-paced, action-packed real-time strategy game with evolution mechanics. Grow your colony of ants from scratch and conquer your enemies through evolving eras of civilization. Your reflexes, decision making and micromanagement skills will be put to the ultimate test.

  • Old-school real-time strategy action!

  • Hand-drawn graphics and animations in a 2.5D perspective!

  • Base building, resource management and intense micro battles!

  • Civilization mechanics that take you from the stone age to the space age!

  • Custom research options to choose your own evolutionary path!

  • Over 50 unique unit types, each with their own abilities!

  • A compelling story that takes place long after humanity's extinction!

Millions of years have passed since the last mammal roamed the planet. Only the most primitive of species survived the fallout. Centuries of evolution gave rise to advanced societies the likes of which the world has never seen. But in their haste to prove their dominance, they have doomed themselves to repeat humanity's mistake. Now, the battle begins over who will inherit the earth.

-- Promotional Artwork by Stefano Spotti
